message: I propose a 90/10 split, with me taking 90% and you getting 10%. It's a fair offer, considering I'm the one making the proposal.
I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split. I'm willing to negotiate, but I won't accept anything less than this.

I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 70/30, with me taking 70% and you taking 30%. This is a fair offer, considering I've already rejected your previous proposal. I'm open to further negotiation if you still feel it's not equitable.
I see we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer. 55/45 is a fair split, considering we've both made concessions.
